roleset.name: (cause to) be coiled, spiraled
roleset.note: CURL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'curl' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry coil-9.6-1, braid-41.2.2. (from curl.01-v)
CURLED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from curled.01-j)

example.name: curl-v: ext
example.text: ``[Wage increases and overall compensation increases]-1 are beginning *trace*-1 to curl upward a little bit,'' said Audrey Freedman, a labor economist at the Conference Board, a business research organization.

example.name: curl-v: agentive
example.text: Mary curls her hair every morning, but John's hair curls naturally.

example.name: curl-v: ergative
example.text: Mary curls her hair every morning, but John's hair curls naturally.

example.name: curled-j: with arg2
example.text: The animal was curled into a ball.

example.name: curl_up-v: automatically generated
example.text: Three minutes into the massage , the man curled up , began shaking and turned red .

roleset.name: ice sport
roleset.note: CURLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from curling.01-n)

example.name: curling-n: Aww, I like curling. No arg.
example.text: Sine games are good to watch . And then there are some that should not be called sporting events at all let alone be in the Olympics - curling I mean wtf is that
